# @template/cache

A shared library package for your Project workspace.

## Installation

```bash
pnpm add @template/cache
```

## Usage

```typescript
import { /* your imports */ } from '@template/cache'

// Your usage examples here
```

## Development

```bash
# Install dependencies
pnpm install

# Build the package
pnpm build

# Watch for changes
pnpm dev

# Type check
pnpm check-types

# Lint
pnpm lint
```
